title: Smoked haddock fish cakes with watercress
ingredients: ['750g (1 1/2 lb) potatoes, peeled and quartered', '500g (1 1/4 lb) skinned smoked haddock fillets', '50g (2 oz) butter, melted', '1 (85g) packet watercress, finely chopped', '2 eggs, beaten', '200g (7 oz) dried breadcrumbs', '3 tablespoons olive oil']
